name: Introduction to Global Cinema
description: A broad survey of global film production from the beginning of the 20th century to the present.

name: History of Film
description: A survey of the history of film, including technological developments, major filmmakers, and critical and theoretical approaches.

name: Cinematography
description: An in-depth study of the art of cinematography, including camera angles, lighting, and composition.

name: Film Editing
description: An in-depth study of the art and technique of film editing, including montage, transitions, and sound design.

name: Film Theory and Criticism
description: An introduction to the theories and history of film criticism and film theory, including aesthetic and ideological approaches.

name: Global Cinema and Culture
description: An exploration of global film production in relation to culture, politics, and history.
